accessDenied.message: Oops, you don't have permissions for the the page you requested. Please contact your administrator. <1><0>learnMore</0></1>

pageNotFound.title: 404 - Page not found
pageNotFound.message: Oops, we weren't able to find the page you requested.

edgeAgentStatus.400: The deployment configuration is malformed or invalid.
edgeAgentStatus.406: The device is offline or not sending status reports.
edgeAgentStatus.412: The deployment configuration schema version is invalid.
edgeAgentStatus.417: The device's deployment configuration is not set.
edgeAgentStatus.500: An error occurred in the IoT Edge runtime.

errorCode.noResponse: Oops, there was no response from the server. Please refresh the page.
errorCode.notLoggedIn: You need to login to call the service. Please refresh the page.
errorCode.notAuthorized: You are not authorized to call the service. Please contact the admin for authorization.
errorCode.notFound: Oops, we were not able to find the service. Please try again later.
errorCode.redirection: Oops, we got a redirection error. Please try again later.
errorCode.retryFailure: Oops, we got a temporary error from the service but were unable to recover. Please try again later.
errorCode.ResourceNotFound: Entity with the specified id does not exist in the system.
errorCode.RequestNotUnderstoodByDatabase: Request not Understood by database. If the issue persists, contact FarmBeatsSupport@microsoft.com
errorCode.DatabaseInternalError: Database is faced some issues.  If the issue persists, contact FarmBeatsSupport@microsoft.com
errorCode.ConflictingResourceFound: Conflicting Resource found. If the issue persists, contact FarmBeatsSupport@microsoft.com
errorCode.DateRangeInvalid: The Date range in filter query is not valid.
errorCode.UpdateOnImmutableFieldsNotAllowed: Updation on immutable fields not allowed.
errorCode.SystemDefinedExtendedTypesUpdateNotAllow: Modification of system defined extended types not allowed.
errorCode.ExtendedTypeKeyNotMatching: Updation of defined extended types is not allowed since keys are not matching.
errorCode.SystemDefinedJobTypeModificationNotAllow: Modification of system defined job types not allowed
errorCode.ArgumentNullorEmptyException: Argument provided is null of empty.
errorCode.UnknownEnumValue: Enum value is not from supported list.
errorCode.TooManySceneFilesToGenerateSASUrl: Too many scene files available to generate download SAS URL.
errorCode.MethodNotImplemented: Method being invoked is not implemented.
errorCode.DeviceIdNotFound: Device with given ID doesn't exist.
errorCode.DeviceModelIdNotFound: Device model with given ID doesn't exist.
errorCode.FarmIdNotFound: Farm with given ID doesn't exist.
errorCode.SensorModelIdNotFound: Sensor model with given ID doesn't exist.
errorCode.JobTypeIdNotFound: Job type with given ID doesn't exist.
errorCode.SceneIdNotFound: Scene with given ID doesn't exist.
errorCode.RoleDefinitionIdNotFound: Role definition with given ID doesn't exist.
errorCode.SceneReferencesFound: Foreign Key one or more reference(s) for Scene exist.
errorCode.SensorMeasureTypeNotFound: Extended type sensor measure type doesn't exist.
errorCode.SensorMeasureUnitNotFound: Extended type sensor measure unit doesn't exist.
errorCode.SceneTypeNotFound: Extended type scene type doesn't exist.
errorCode.SceneSourceNotFound: Extended type scene source doesn't exist.
errorCode.SceneFileTypeNotFound: Extended type scene file type doesn't exist.
errorCode.SceneFileContentTypeNotFound: Extended type scene file content type doesn't exist.
errorCode.DeleteOfRunningJobNotAllowed: Delete of running job is not allowed.
errorCode.InvalidJobArgument: Job argument is not matching with parameter defined in Job Type.
errorCode.DeviceModelReferencesFound: Foreign Key one or more reference(s) for DeviceModel exist.
errorCode.DeviceReferencesFound: Foreign Key one or more reference(s) for Device exist.
errorCode.SensorModelReferencesFound: Foreign Key one or more reference(s) for SensorModel exist.

errorCode.JobReferencesFound: Foreign Key one or more reference(s) for Job exist.
errorCode.JobTypeReferencesFound: Foreign Key one or more reference(s) for Job Type exist.
errorCode.TSIParamValidationFailed: Input param validation exception from TSI.
errorCode.MaximumLimitExceeded: Request contains fields where maximum limit is exceeded.
errorCode.MinumumOneRequired: Request contains fields where minimum limit is one.

settingsFlyout.title: Settings
settingsFlyout.simulationDescription: Start or stop simulation of devices. Stopping device simulation will minimize the cost of the solution; no simulated telemetry will be sent to your IoT Hub and alerts will not be generated for simulated devices.
settingsFlyout.sendDiagnosticsText: Azure FarmBeats can send anonymous information to Microsoft, such as error logs, configuration, and information about how you use the application. No personal information is collected.
settingsFlyout.qrCode: FarmBeats Account QR Code for mobile app

deleteConfirmation: You may have rules configured for this sensor. Deleting the sensor without deleting rules may result in abandoned rules.

descriptionPanel.panelBody: To Start, select on any one of the marking tools, and start marking on the farm
descriptionPanel.geoJSONInstructions: GeoJSON is an open standard format designed for representing simple geographical features, along with their spatial attributes, based on JSON.
descriptionPanel.markOnMapDisabled: Mark On Map is only supported for Polygon geometries.

geoJSON.panelBody: Enter a GeoJSON marking Boundary of Farm.
geoJSON.geoJSONError: Sorry, we don't support that input. Please specify only 'Geometry' of type 'Polygon' and 'MultiPolygon.'
geoJSON.geoJSONErrorStatement: A linear ring MUST follow the right-hand rule with respect to the area it bounds, i.e., exterior rings are counterclockwise, and holes are clockwise.
geoJSON.invalidCoordinates: the coordinates should be 2 dimensional only.
geoJSON.invalidXCoordinate: the x coordinate value must be between -180 and 180
geoJSON.invalidYCoordinate: the y coordinate value must be between -90 and 90

delete.title: Delete Farm?
deleteConfirmation: All the devices connected to this farm will become unlinked.
You will still be able to see the past maps generated for this farm.
You may have rules configured for this farm. Deleting the farm without deleting rules may result in abandoned rules.
Are you sure you want to delete the farm?

toolTips.farmName: Enter the name of your farm. A farm is an area of land which you want to monitor.
toolTips.crops: Enter a crop that you grow on this farm. This will help you find your farm by crop type.

modal.noGeneratedYet: You have not generated any maps yet.
modal.Disclaimer: Disclaimer: Precision maps are influenced by Sentinel's path coverage, cloud cover and cloud shadow on that day.

flyouts.satteliteIndicesMapDescription: Generate EVI, NDVI and NDWI for your farm. This might take a few hours.
flyouts.soilMoistureMapDescription: Generate Soil Moisture map based on your soil sensor data and satellite data. This might take a few hours. Atleast 3 soil moisture sensors are needed.
flyouts.sensorPlacementMapDescription: Get insight into how many sensors you need for your farm & where to best place them. This may take 18-24 hours to complete.
flyouts.allMapsLink: View all Precision Maps for this farm
flyouts.selectFarms: Select farm for which you want to generate the maps
flyouts.soilMoistureTooltip: Soil moisture heatmap is generated for sensors having the same depth measurement from the same manufacturer.

header.telefonica: As a Telefónica IoT customer you have the advantage of adding this feature to enrich automatically your Azure FarmBeats Solution with the connectivity data available in Telefónica IoT Connectivity Platform (Network Information, Data Consumption & Network Based Location).

description.telefonica:
This feature is in Preview. In order to sync your connectivity data into Azure FarmBeats Solution, please fill a request <1><0>url</0></1>, select the option “Azure FarmBeats” and include your contact data and we will automatically activate your account. 

If you are not a Telefónica client yet and you want to enjoy this or other IoT Connectivity Cloud Ready services, you can contact us <1><0>url</0></1> and select the option “Connectivity”; we will be glad to help you.

deleteModal.title: Device Delete
deleteConfirmation: You may have rules configured for this device. Deleting the device without deleting rules may result in abandoned rules.
Deleting the device will not automatically stop the telemetry data flowing in to FarmBeats. Ensure the device is also removed in your physical setup to stop the data flow in to FarmBeats.
Are you sure you want to delete the device?

description.telefonica:
This feature is in Preview. In order to sync your connectivity data into Azure FarmBeats Solution, please fill a request <1><0>url</0></1>, select the option “Azure FarmBeats” and include your contact data and we will automatically activate your account. 

If you are not a Telefónica client yet and you want to enjoy this or other IoT Connectivity Cloud Ready services, you can contact us <1><0>url</0></1> and select the option “Connectivity”; we will be glad to help you.

new.priorityToolTip: When two deployments target the same device, the deployment with the higher priority gets applied. If two deployments have the same priority, the deployment with the later creation date gets applied. <1><0>Learn</0></1>
new.infoText: This deployment runs continuously. Every device (and any you add in the future) in the selected device group will receive this package.

eula.disagree: To start using the application please read and agree to the terms by clicking on the I Agree button
eula.0_d: These license terms are an agreement between you and Microsoft Corporation (or one of its affiliates). They apply to the software named above and any Microsoft services or software updates (except to the extent such services or updates are accompanied by new or additional terms, in which case those different terms apply prospectively and do not alter your or Microsoft’s rights relating to pre-updated software or services). IF YOU COMPLY WITH THESE LICENSE TERMS, YOU HAVE THE RIGHTS BELOW. BY USING THE SOFTWARE, YOU ACCEPT THESE TERMS.
eula.1a_d: You may install and use any number of copies of the software on your devices.
eula.1b_d: The software may include third party applications that Microsoft, not the third party, licenses to you under this agreement. Any included notices for third party applications are for your information only.
eula.1c_d: The software may contain some items on the Utilities List at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=524839. You may copy and install those items, if included with the software, on your machines or third party machines to debug and deploy the applications and databases you develop with the software. Please note that Utilities are designed for temporary use, that Microsoft may not be able to patch or update Utilities separately from the rest of the software, and that some Utilities by their nature may make it possible for others to access machines on which they are installed. You should delete all Utilities you have installed after you finish debugging or deploying your applications and databases. Microsoft is not responsible for any third party use or access of Utilities you install on any machine.
eula.1d_d: The software may include package managers, like NuGet, that give you the option to download other Microsoft and third party software packages to use with your application. Those packages are under their own licenses, and not this agreement. Microsoft does not distribute, license or provide any warranties for any of the third party packages.
eula.2a_d: This agreement is effective on your acceptance and terminates on the earlier of (i) 30 days following first availability of a commercial release of the software or (ii) upon termination by Microsoft. Microsoft may extend this agreement in its discretion.
eula.2b_d: You may receive periodic reminder notices of this date through the software.
eula.2c_d: You may not be able to access data used in the software when it stops running.
eula.3_d: The software is a pre-release version. It may not operate correctly. It may be different from the commercially released version.
eula.4_d: If you give feedback about the software to Microsoft, you give to Microsoft, without charge, the right to use, share and commercialize your feedback in any way and for any purpose. You will not give feedback that is subject to a license that requires Microsoft to license its software or documentation to third parties because Microsoft includes your feedback in them. These rights survive this agreement.
eula.5_d: The software may collect information about you and your use of the software and send that to Microsoft. Microsoft may use this information to provide services and improve Microsoft’s products and services. Your opt-out rights, if any, are described in the product documentation. Some features in the software may enable collection of data from users of your applications that access or use the software. If you use these features to enable data collection in your applications, you must comply with applicable law, including getting any required user consent, and maintain a prominent privacy policy that accurately informs users about how you use, collect, and share their data. You can learn more about Microsoft’s data collection and use in the product documentation and the Microsoft Privacy Statement at https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=512132. You agree to comply with all applicable provisions of the Microsoft Privacy Statement.
eula.6_d: The software is licensed, not sold. Microsoft reserves all other rights. Unless applicable law gives you more rights despite this limitation, you will not (and have no right to):
eula.6a_d: work around any technical limitations in the software that only allow you to use it in certain ways;
eula.6b_d: reverse engineer, decompile or disassemble the software;
eula.6c_d: remove, minimize, block, or modify any notices of Microsoft or its suppliers in the software;
eula.6d_d: use the software in any way that is against the law or to create or propagate malware; or
eula.6e_d: share, publish, distribute, or lend the software, provide the software as a stand-alone hosted solution for others to use, or transfer the software or this agreement to any third party.
eula.7_d: You must comply with all domestic and international export laws and regulations that apply to the software, which include restrictions on destinations, end users, and end use. For further information on export restrictions, visit http://aka.ms/exporting.
eula.8_d: Microsoft is not obligated under this agreement to provide any support services for the software. Any support provided is “as is”, “with all faults”, and without warranty of any kind.
eula.9_d: The software may periodically check for updates, and download and install them for you. You may obtain updates only from Microsoft or authorized sources. Microsoft may need to update your system to provide you with updates. You agree to receive these automatic updates without any additional notice. Updates may not include or support all existing software features, services, or peripheral devices.
eula.10_d: Without prejudice to any other rights, Microsoft may terminate this agreement if you fail to comply with any of its terms or conditions. In such event, you must destroy all copies of the software and all of its component parts.
eula.11_d: This agreement, and any other terms Microsoft may provide for supplements, updates, or third-party applications, is the entire agreement for the software.
eula.12_h: APPLICABLE LAW AND PLACE TO RESOLVE DISPUTES.
eula.12_d: If you acquired the software in the United States or Canada, the laws of the state or province where you live (or, if a business, where your principal place of business is located) govern the interpretation of this agreement, claims for its breach, and all other claims (including consumer protection, unfair competition, and tort claims), regardless of conflict of laws principles.
